name: Chuck Jones
employer: Ub Iwerks Studio (1931–1933) Warner Bros. Cartoons (1933–1962) Walt Disney Animation Studios (1953) Sib Tower 12 Productions (1962–1970) Warner Bros. Feature Animation (1994-1997)
notable_works: ''Looney Tunes'', ''Merrie Melodies'', ''Tom and Jerry'', ''How the Grinch Stole Christmas!''
